name: LD43 - Volcano Rush
description:
VOLCANO RUSH

Do you have what it takes to get the village's sacrifice to the mouth of the volcano before the angry volcano god destroys us all?  Can you avoid the lava and burning rocks that stand in your way?  Find out in Volcano Rush!

This game was created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 43 game jam!  The theme of the jam was "Sacrifices must be made."

Controls:

[A] Moves Backward
[D] Moves Forward
[Space] Jumps.

Tools Used:

Visual Studio, Notepad++, ZBrush, Blender, Photoshop, Audacity, FontBuilder, FL Studio.

This was created using my custom C++ game library. All bugs are totally my fault.

Feedback

I hope you have fun and if you could, please leave me some feedback, even if it’s just “hey, this sucks” or “hey, that was fun.”

Notes

Be aware that jumping might feel a bit odd.  The way I implemented following the path around the mountain makes for some interesting jumps in some spots.  It shouldn't take long to get used to and you might not even notice it at all.  The hitboxes on the lava are a bit generous, so you can get pretty close before jumping.  Keep that in mind if you are having trouble making it over the lava.
